text: The Southern Min Wikipedia (Pe̍h-ōe-jī: Wikipedia Bân-lâm-gú) or Holopedia:zh:闽南语维基百科 is the Southern Min version of Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia. It is the second biggest Wikipedia that is a variety of Chinese. The biggest variety of Chinese wikipedia is Mandarin.List of Wikipedias It mostly uses the Hokkien Taiwanese dialect. It has over [ 400,000] articles.List of Wikipedias on Meta-Wiki. == Relevant pages == * Wikipedia in other varieties of Chinese * Taiwanese Hokkien * Peh-oe-ji == References == == Other websites == * Southern Min Wikipedia Category:Wikipedias
title: Southern Min Wikipedia
